statement.p: Find the area of the quadrilateral shown. The lengths of the four sides (counterclockwise) are \displaystyle{a}={5.3} , \displaystyle{b}={8.3}, \displaystyle{c}={11.5}, and \displaystyle{d}={14.6}, with diagonal length \displaystyle{e}={10.0} from the intersection of a and d to the intersection of b and c . Measurements are in yards. What is the area of this figure?
